transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha sir very good morning.
Customer: Good morning sir. How may I help you how may I help? Sir sir Raju Mishra this side from IndiaMART head office Noida. We have just getting a complaint on your from your side regarding the valid quality.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: So so I just need to discuss on that particular point sir that what type of leads are you getting from IndiaMART side and what are the issue have you facing right now because last time also we had discussed.
Customer: Yeah yeah sir. So please give me a minute please keep on online on hold and call okay. I am connecting concern person about it.
Executive: Okay.

(silence)
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Yeah sir so I am saying that we have raised ticket about we are not receiving leads in IndiaMART there there
Customer: Sometimes of before one week we have a good lead but right now after that we have the same issue facing like not coming correct leads like not for coming hotel leads and
Customer: Just a minute sir I am opening my cap.
Executive: Okay sir. Then explain you.
Executive: Yes sir yeah.
Customer: Hello. Ha sir mostly in this last week we are purchased in fake leads.
Executive: Hello good morning.
Executive: Okay fake lead means it means
Customer: Abhi main aapko data share kar deta hu jo hai unka leads ka jo hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur before that before three months mere pass mein leads ka achcha tha flow but uske baad mein bekar ho gaya then abhi last time around 15 days pehle ticket raise hua tha to us time pe do teen din ke liye flow theek hua tha then uske baad mein fir disturb ho gaya ye.
Executive: Theek hai. Ah main aapse do cheeze jaanna chahunga sir. May I know your good name?
Customer: Kapil.
Executive: Kapil. Okay Kapil ji do cheeze main jaanna chahunga ki kyuki basically hum is leads pe ticket wale jo problems chal rahe hain. Theek hai. Ah main discuss karna chahunga ki humari jo buyleads humne jo consume kiya hua hai and right now jo buyleads aa rahi hai. Jaisa ki aap bata rahe hain ki aapko hotel lock ya fir baat karta hu card lock ki leads nahi aa rahi hai right?
Customer: Hmm exactly.
Executive: Okay. So sir see kya hota hai na ki maine ye baar baar bhi bola hai ki dekhiye hamare waha kyuki
Customer: Hmm boliye boliye aap.
Executive: Hamare waha catalog hai. Ah main baat karta hu agar to smart door lock digital door lock RFID card lock hotel lock aur card lock aur hotel key card. To hota kya hai ki hum leads aapke pass sabhi categories ki generate karte hain. Jaruri nahi hai ki jaise ki for example ki main is baat se agree karte hue chal raha hu ki aapke pass ho sakta hai ki aane wale time pe kuch leads ka flow kam hua hoga. Theek hai. Ah is baat se agree number bulk mein lead aati hai number bulk mein lead hi nahi hai na chakkar to ye hai na main agree kar sakta hu main agree kar raha hu sir is baat ko main agree kar raha hu isme deny nahi karta. So dekhiye kya hai na ki maine ye baat last time bhi bola hai ki dekhiye hamare pass bulk aur retail dono prakar ki leads generate hoti hai. Ab yaha pe hota kya hai ki agar main abhi aapka maine open kiya hai system aur ek baar buylead wale option pe ja sakte hain kya aapke? Share kiya tha update nahi aaya abhi tak. Buyleads pe aa gaye aap? Haan main open kar liya maine. Theek hai. Ab yaha pe na buyleads pe aap jayenge to location mein ek baar click karke and waha pe na aapko ek bulk ka option aa raha hoga order value ka option aa raha hoga. Bulk ka option aa raha hai lead type. Theek hai. Aur lead type nahi aapko waha pe location pe aapne India click kiya? Ah just a minute. Theek hai okay sir koi baat nahi.
Customer: Buy lead then where need to go?
Executive: Location.
Customer: Location. It's showing on top or bottom? Top. Ah which device are you using right now? Like laptop, desktop or mouse?
Customer: Laptop.
Executive: Laptop. Okay. So if you see on the right side on the top top okay there are the multiple option that is location and leads and categories like that. Okay order value leads type. Have you seen on the on the top sir?
Customer: Haan yeah seeing that like order values and leads. Ji ji. To aapko karna kya hai na do cheeze main yaha pe karke dekh raha hu. Ah yaha pe jo buyleads ka flow chal raha hai sir main agree karta hu ki aapke pass kuch retail bhi aa rahi hai but kuch bulk bhi aa rahi hai. Agar main aisa kyu bol raha hu kyuki do reason hai sir abhi maine open kiya hai ki aapka buylead consumption pattern. Theek hai jo aapne buylead consume kari hui hai. So maine kai baar yahi bola hai ki dekhiye hum aapko bulk aur retail dono hi dete hain. Theek hai bulk dete hain ab aisa nahi hai ki main aapko ye bol sakta hu ki sir ki main 110% aapko bulk buyleads hi dena start kar dunga nahi. Hamare pass jis prakar ki buyleads aati hai hum aapke pass allocate karte hain yaha pe bulk bhi hota hai aur retail bhi hota hai. To abhi main jo dekh pa raha hu ki aapne aaj ke din mein ek buylead consume kari hai electronic door lock ki. Customer is from Delhi and customer name is Rohit. Okay quantity is 12. To basically hum buyleads consume kar rahe hain us prakar ki. But kya hai ki agar hum hum ye maan ke chale ki nahi hume continuously aise hi leads mile to might be there is
Customer: Mujhe pata hai main main samajhta hu ki bulk detail bulk aur number one quantity two quantity mein aati hai. But sir ye to kuch challenge hi ho gaya na ek tarike se dekha jaye to kyuki pehle to lead ka flow bahut achcha tha then fir se disturb hua hai flow jo hai. Main main ye nahi keh raha ki aap mujhe 100% hi mujhe bulk mein lead dijiye. Theek hai but at least aisa to issue rakhiye ki us equally pooche dekho bulk lead aapko pata hai purchase karne ka ek reason hota hai aur lead purchase nahi karenge to lapse ho jayengi aapko pata hai. Theek hai to wo to hamara majburi hota hai ki hum logo ko bulk purchase karne ka theek hai chahe single piece ka dikhta hai aur hamari category se matching ka hai to humko purchase karna hi hai. Theek hai. Bilkul bilkul. Aaj agar hum aaj aap single piece ka ya haan. Aaj aapne approximately one four buylead consume kari hai. Ek cheez maine notice kiya hai suniye sir maine ek cheez aur notice kiya hai aapke IndiaMART pe jo lead buylead mein aate hain na chahe wo single piece ka bhi hota hai usme bhi business use hota hai aapka. Sir har lead pe paise possible ho jayega ki business use ke liye chahiye hoga single piece. Nahi aap yaha pe do cheeze hain sir main main basically is point pe bhi aana chahunga. To dekhiye. Customers jo IndiaMART ke portal pe aa raha hai theek hai. Ho sakta hai do tarike ke customer ho sakte hain aapne kaha na ki har lead pe chahe wo ek lead ek lead ke liye quantity ke liye bhi aata hai to business use likh deta hai. Theek hai. Aap waha notice kariyega ki jitne bhi buyleads aapke pass show ho rahi hai theek hai na so usme ek member hai us wo jo buyer hai hamare waha jinka experience raha hai wo six plus year six plus month rehta hai theek hai ab hota kya hai ki kai bar wo business use ke liye lete hain to for example ki agar main ek businessman hu maine apni requirement post kari theek hai to mujhe ye bhi dekhna hai ki markets mein agar mera experience thoda sa is prakar se hai ki kuch naya product hum try kar rahe hain portal pe to wo supplier ke hath mein buyer ke hath mein hai ki wo business use dalte hain ya fir personal use theek hai hum aane wale time pe humne ye bhi dekha hai ki sir ki waha pe business use nahi mention hota hai one quantity ke liye but yaha pe customer agar waha pe dal raha hai to hum uske accordingly aapke pass allocate karte hain ab aati hai baat se meri team mein aapke baat hua tha to unhone mujhe bola tha ki single piece pe tum dekhoge nahi iska flow unhone bola ki jo waha pe single lead hai business use ho sakta hai ki aapke in future bhi ho sakta hai business use ke liye to humne jab maan liya agree kar liya but mostly probably 90% lead jo unme mention hai business use single piece par bhi business use haan main dekh raha hu main dekh raha hu to haan wahi cheez hai ki kahin na kahin to kuch na kuch matlab mismatch ho raha hai leke aur yahi requirement rehti hai ki jo mismatch ho jati hai fake lead mein aa jati hai. Ya to requirement nahi hoti hai fake lead mein hota hai ki unhone post nahi kiya hota hai ye cheez hoti hai inme. Mera kehne ka ye hai ki lead ka flow bahut disturb hai please aap ek baar isko dekhiye workout kariye aur isko ek baar dekhiye teen mahine September month mein jo hamara jo filter laga hua tha ek baar use dekhiye then aapke ko compare kariye kuch to disturb hua hai aapki side se ya meri side se main to please ek baar correct main check out main check out kar leta hu ek baar further aapko ek baar call back karunga. Might be ki yaha pe might be Kapil ji ki ho sakta hai ki main ek baar review overall karu kyuki maine catalog check kiya catalog mein accurate hai theek hai humne jo buyleads consume kari hai buyleads mein bhi humne aaj char buylead consume kari aur char mein bhi teen panch teen panch aur 18 aur 20 hai theek hai yani jo teen quantity aap dekh rahe hain buyleads ka jo hai dekh raha hu main jo electronic door lock ki maine baat kari hai usme humne buylead jo consume kari hai wo 12 piece ki hai quantity Rohit jo Delhi se hai theek hai aur usme mujhe pata hai wo to jo main dekh liya data wo maine purchase kiya tha jo hai ji ji aur ek aur active rehte hain sir lead purchase karne ke liye active rehte hain meri team jo hai is tarike ki active main is baat ko active ki baat alag hai day mein to hum log active hi rehte hain haan bilkul bilkul main is baat ko agree karte hue chal raha hu main aapko kabhi bhi is point pe kabhi bhi apne end se dekhiye then mujhe update kariye. Ah main aapko mujhe haan mujhe ho sakta hai ki aap se meeting bhi karna pade kyuki main aap yaha pe jo discuss karunga ye teen teen point pe discuss karunga sir pehla point to ye discuss hoga ho sakta hai mere senior bhi usme involve rahenge theek hai na. No issue sir aap kar sakte ho meeting jo hai aap before 5 pm meeting schedule karna. Haan ji aur ek cheez aur aap kariye ki matlab aap hai aur aapke sath jo bhi concern person rahe jo ki is pe aur kyuki hum mail bhi Sumit sir ke pass karte hain theek hai na to jab hum hum meeting pe aayenge to make sure ki wo bhi rahe kyuki mere senior agar rehte hain agar wo apna concern raise karenge to jahir si baat hai ki hum waha pe aur kyuki maine apne tarike taraf se maine koshish puri kari hai ki aapko leads aur in fact aap leads consume kar rahe hain theek hai waise wali baat nahi hai ki aapko keh rahe hain ki nahi hamare pass jo leads aa rahi hai wo is tarike ki aa rahi hai usko bhi main ek baar identify kar leta hu further main aapko mujhe time dijiye main apne senior se dobara baat karke ek meeting karta hu theek hai na and confirm karta hu. Theek hai sir aap haan aap check kar lijiye koi issue nahi hai aap jo hai meeting ho to mujhe dena pehle aap dekh lijiye ek baar verify kar lijiye kya challenge aa raha hai kahan kuch changes hua hai theek hai aap time dijiye koi issue nahi hai sir. Okay okay sir okay thank you. Welcome sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving correct leads in IndiaMART.

- Purchased fake leads in the last week.

- Lead flow has been disturbed.

- Most leads are marked as business use.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to check the issue.

- Executive will call back after checking.

- Executive will schedule a meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking.

- Meeting to be scheduled before 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, fake leads, lead flow, business use, catalog
